site_name: Trumpeters HouseOld Palace YardRichmondTW9 1PD
description: T1 - Norway Maple (x1) - Reduce longest lateral branches over the roof of Trumpeters House by 2-2.5m. Thin crown by 20% and crown lift by 2m to a height of 4m. Final height of tree would be 14m and final width is 10m.T2 - Norway Maple (x1) - Reduce lateral branches over opposite gardens by 2-2.5m. Thin crown by 20%. Final height of tree would be 14m and final width is 10m. T3 - Norway Maple (x1) - Fell to ground level.T5 - Norway Maple (x1) - Reduce lateral branches over neighbours by 2-2.5m and thin crown by 20%. Final height of tree would be 14m and final width is 10m.T6 - Norway Maple (x1) - Reduce lateral branches over neighbours by 2-2.5m and thin crown by 20%. Final height of tree would be 14m and final width is 10m.T7 - Norway Maple (x1) - Reduce lateral branches over neighbours by 2-2.5m and thin crown by 20%. Final height of tree would be 14m and final width is 10m.T10 - Norway Maple (x1) - Reduce height by 2-3m and width by 1-2m. Reduce lateral branches over neighbours by 2m. Final height of tree would be 14m and final width is 10m.T11 - Norway Maple (x1) - Reduce height by 3-4m and width by 1-2m. Reduce lateral branches over neighbours by 2m. Final height of tree would be 12m and final width is 10m.T12 - Norway Maple (x1) - Reduce height by 3-4m and width by 1-2m. Reduce lateral branches over neighbours by 2m. Final height of tree would be 12m and final width is 10m.
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T8
